czero.rom.name: C-ZERO
czero.rom.info: A racing game inspired by Chris Covell's tribute to the iconic Nintendo franchise.

dvd.rom.name: Corners
dvd.rom.info: The bouncing logo of a popular disc-shaped video storage medium. It might touch the corner someday...
dvd.rom.author: Kyle Saburao

dvdgame.rom.name: Corners Game
dvdgame.rom.info: The bouncing logo of a popular disc-shaped video storage medium... but this time, it's a game.
dvdgame.rom.author: Kyle Saburao

warshaws_revenge.rom.name: Warshaws' Revenge
warshaws_revenge.rom.info: This fun shooter is the antithesis to the great crash of '83.
warshaws_revenge.rom.author: Ethan Pini

ec8tp.rom.name: Team Chipotle Test
ec8tp.rom.info: A program which runs tests designed for 500 Hz CHIP-8 emulators.
ec8tp.rom.author: Ethan Pini

MAZE.rom.name: MAZE
MAZE.rom.info: MAZE, which is a classic CHIP8 Game that draws a random maze everytime it is loaded.
MAZE.rom.author: Firas Fakih
